item.title: Make your R plot Hylian
item.description: Below are presented the 6 steps you need to make your plot a Hylian one! May the triforce be with you! 0. R Version 1 2 sessionInfo()[[1L]]$version.string #R> [1] "R version 3.5.2 (2018-12-20)" 1. Open R and download the font The Triforce font is available on line. Below we download it using R. Alternatively, you may simply download and install it using a couple of clicks, if you proceed so, skip step 1.
